channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services

item.title: CVE-2022-43871|2024-08-03T13:40:06.573Z -- ibm -- financial%20transaction%20manager%20for%20swift%20services
item.description: IBM Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services 3.2.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 239707.
